name: SKY BASH
description:
Dies ist ein Projekt welche im Rahmen der Projektarbeit der Games Academy innerhalb von 8 Wochen erstellt wurde.

What are we?

SkyBash, is a fast paced 3rd person Arena Shooter inspired by the fast gameplay of “Quake 3 Arena” and the combat mechanics of “Super Smash Bros”. The players fight each other on small platforms and try to knock their opponents off the level.

References

Inspired by games like Spiral knights for character art, „Quake 3 Arena“ for Level Concept, „Super Smash Bros“ for gameplay mechanics. The platform level concepts are based on Avatar´s flying islands. Spiral Knights Quake 3 Arena Avatar Flying Islands

Technical details

- Engine: Unity 3D

- Plattform: Pc

- Controls: keyboard & mouse

Key features

- Third Person Online Multiplayer Shooter

- Plattform Arena and Jumppads

- Action loaded gameplay

- Comic Art style

- Cute characters

Team: Uppercut Entertainment

Designer: Moritz Bokelmann 

Programmierer: William Ratz, Erick Fernandez

Producer: Sascha Brandowsky 

Artist: Johannes Geier, Laura Lückemeyer, Marko Rudjic
